name: debug-bootloader
description: This is a simple bootloader that can be used to debug the boot process of a node application. Converts console.info to traces to track the file and line number information without modifying the source code.

scripts.prepack: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:es
scripts.publish: npm run prepack && git add . && git commit -a -m merge && git push && release-it minor

author: Michael Bakker
